# Algorithm

# Kruskul (Union find)

def find(x):
    if P[x] != x:
        P[x] = find(P[x])
    return P[x]

def union(a, b):
    if a < b:
        P[b] = a
    else:
        P[a] = b

L.sort()
for i in L:
    cost, a, b = i
    if a != b:
        a = find(a)
        b = find(b)
        union(a, b)
        result += cost

# Dijkstra (인접행렬)

while q:
    cw, cx, cy = heapq.heappop(q)

    for i in range(4):
        nx = cx + dy[i]
        ny = cy + dy[i]

        for 0 <= nx < N and 0 <= ny < M:
            nw = cw + MAP[nx][ny]
            if nw < D[nx][ny]
                D[nx][ny] = nw
                heapq.heappush(q, (nw, nx, ny))

# Dijkstra (간선)

while q:
    cw, cn = heapq.heappop(q)

    if D[cn] < cw: continue

    for w, n in G[cn]:
        nw = w + cw
        if nw < D[n]:
            D[n] = nw
            heapq.heappush(q, [nw, n])
return D

# Bellman Ford

dp[start] = 0

for i in range(V):
    for j in range(E):
        a, b, c = G[j]
        if dp[a] != INF and dp[b] > dp[a]+c:
            dp[b] = dp[a]+c
            if i==V-1:
                return True
return False

# Floyd Warshall

for k in range(N)
    G[k][k] = 0
    for i in range(N):
        for j in range(N):
            G[i][j] = min(G[i][j], G[i][k]+G[k][j])
# 목표 지점까지 갈 수 없는 경우(INF) 고려

# Topological Sort

# q에는 inDegree의 값이 아닌, index가 저장된다
while q:
    cur = q.popleft()
    ans.append(cur+1)
    for i in G[cur]:
        inDegree[i] -= 1
        if inDegree[i] == 0:
            q.append(i)

# Knapsack

for i in range(1, N+1):
    for j in range(1, K+1):
        curW, curV = item[i-1]

        if curW <= j:
            dp[i][j] = max(dp[i-1][j], curV + dp[i-1][j-curW])
        else:
            dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j]
